general_advisory: Kharif crop 2024: 1. Due to Forecast of Very light to Light rainfall from 28th Sept. farmers are advised to postpone application of fertilizer & chemical during this period. 2. Due to high humidity, survey for any insect pest in kharif crops.

advisory: Due to weather, there is a chance of sheath blight in paddy. To manage this disease, spray Validamycin @ 2 ml/liter of water.
To manage Pod borer in green gram and black gram crop, spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80-gram/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC @ 80-ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400-ml/acre.

Due to the weather condition, there is a chance of Bacterial Leaf Blight. To manage this, spray 1 g Streptomycin and 30 g copper oxychloride per 10 liters of water. Apply 20 kg urea and + 13 kg MOP in Medium and low land condition.
Due to weather effect, there is a chance of stem borer attack. To manage this, spray Fipronil @ 2 g/liter of water.
Due to weather effect, there is Leaf webber seen. To manage this, spray Carbaryl @ 4 g/liter of water and to be sprayed on the leaf surface.
Due to weather effect, there is a chance of Aphids infestation. To manage this, spray Imidachloprid @ 0.4 ml/liter of water.
The early sown crop is at maturity stage. Go for harvesting and dry it under the sun for 2-3 days.
Go for intercultivation and apply 55 kg Urea and 33 kg MOP per acre.
Go for tomato sowing. Collect good varieties like Arka Rakshak. The spacing between lines should be 60 cm.
Due to rainfall, do not allow water to remain stagnant near the base of the crop.
Provide mineral mixture @ 3% of the body mass.
Provide sufficient fodder to the milch animals.
